CreditLine: Acquired by William T. Walters, before 1879

Exhibitions.ExhTitle: Italian Vistas: Selections from the Permanent Collection
Exhibitions.Textblock: Italian Vistas: Selections from the Permanent Collection. The Walters Art Gallery, Baltimore. 1992-1993.

Exhibitions.ExhTitle: The Essence of Line: French Drawings from Ingres to Degas
Exhibitions.Textblock: The Essence of Line: French Drawings from Ingres to Degas. The Walters Art Museum, Baltimore; Baltimore Museum of Art, Baltimore; Birmingham Museum of Art, Birmingham; Tacoma Art Museum, Tacoma. 2005-2006.

Exhibitions.ExhTitle: A Connoisseur's Portfolio: Nineteenth-century Drawings and Watercolors in the Walters Art Gallery
Exhibitions.Textblock: A Connoisseur's Portfolio: Nineteenth-century Drawings and Watercolors in the Walters Art Gallery. The Walters Art Gallery, Baltimore. 1983.

Inscriptions: EH in pastel in lower right; No. 25 on sticker on reverse of frame; label on reverse of frame, removed with frame April 9, 1963: Exposition d'Objets d'Art de Bronze et de Fantaisie / Alph. Giroux & Cie / 43 Boult. des Capucines, et Rue Neuve des Capucines, 24 / Encadrement de Tableaux Dessins et Miniatures / Papeterie, Couleurs, Crayons et Pastels / Vente et Location de Tableaux, Dessins et Mannequins
Medium: pastel on gray, moderately thick, moderately rough, wove paper
Provenance: William T. Walters, Baltimore, before 1879, [mode of acquisition unknown]; Henry Walters, Baltimore, 1894, by inheritance; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Title: At the Well
